aka: The Poet of Cinema: Artavazd Peleshyan

cast.name: 阿尔塔瓦斯德·佩莱希扬 Artavazd Peleshian
高佛雷·雷吉奥 Godfrey Reggio
谢尔盖·帕拉杰诺夫 Sergei Parajanov

trans_title: The Poet of Cinema: Artavazd Peleshyan
introduction: The ARM Ministry of Culture, Cinema Centre of Armenia, and Hayk Ordyan present a documentary about world-famous film director, author of distant montage Artavazd Peleshyan.World-famous American documentarist Godfrey Reggio, German well-known film critic Hans Joahim Shlegel, Russian film world authorities Mikhail Shvidkoy, Sergey Miroshnichenko, Peleshyan's close friends -- painter Hakob Hakobyan, composer Tigran Mansuryan and those who had the chance to know great director's works, tell about their impressions.On december 6, 2009 took place the film's premiere in "Moscow" Cinema and then it was aired on Armenian Public Television.In May, 2010 "The Poet of Cinema: Artavazd Peleshyan" documentary participated in the film markets of Cannes and East Silver Film Festivals, Prague
